page.title: 17Food Shopping Habits.
page.content: {266 Households}took part; it covered the entire Domesday Project area. Where do people do most of their shopping?{60%}use Uckfield (the near- est town);{18%,}Lewes (90% use super- markets). Only{1%}use their local store which in most cases are the{Post {Offices}(some people are nearer to Uckfield). People who shop in towns other than Uckfield tend to do so because they work there or are passing through. Otherwise special trips are made about once a week. Few shop less than once a week, although{93%}have freezers.{88%}use private cars. The P.O.'s provide an important ser- vice.{53%}use them mostly because they are convenient, e.g. buying items for- gotten from the towns. Others collect pensions or buy stamps. The choice of goods and better prices in the towns make the{local stores}less attractive.
